heading: Egypt. Literatures.
general-note: Here are entered collections of literature from Egypt in various ancient and modern languages. Collections of literature from Egypt in various modern languages are entered under. Egyptian literature, Modern.. Collections of literature in the ancient Egyptian language are entered under. Egyptian literature.. Collections of literature from Egypt in individual languages other than the ancient Egyptian language are entered under specific headings for the literature, e.g.. Arabic literature--Egypt; Coptic literature; Egyptian literature, Modern (French)..
